document_data.name: Tarchamus' volcano
document_data.mainbody: '''''Tarchamus' volcano''''' was an extremely powerful [[spell]] created by the legendary [[Netherese]] [[arcanist]] [[Tarchamus the Unyielding]].{{Cite digital book/Lesser Evils|5105}}
document_data.Effects: The spell harnessed the power of [[Phlegethos]] to create a volcano capable of destroying cities. The gate to Phlegethos opened directly under the caster, which made it necessary for the caster to either quickly remove himself from the area or else have extremely powerful protection from fire.<ref>{{Cite digital book/Lesser Evils}}
document_data.History:
In {{YearlinkConvert|1374|NY}}, Tarchamus used the spell to destroy the floating Netherese city of [[Tenish]]. Thereafter, many powerful Netherese arcanists spent years searching for the spell, only to die in traps laid to catch them by Tarchamus.<ref>{{Cite digital book/Lesser Evils||20}}

In the {{YearlinkName|1478}}, a group of adventurers including the [[tiefling]] [[Farideh]] and her sister [[Havilar]] used the spell to destroy [[Library of Tarchamus|Tarchamus's secret library]].
